name: BloodRush (Jknapp)
description:
Heads up! This game was built for Mac users. So if you have the ability to play it through the download please do. The play in browser version works-ish but isn't a great representation of our project. More info in the description below. 

This our first game and our very first game jam as a team, we worked super hard on it. and learned a ton over this 2 week long jam.  Hope you enjoy and please leave any feedback in the comments! 

Zack Knapp - Art Design

James Knapp - Music 

Joe Knapp  - Developer 

You're a blood cell attempting to gather all the platelets before the time runs out! *Platelets give you bonus time. You dash with the pulse of the (Heart) beat. Use your bounciness and the pulse  to your advantage. Sound On. 

Controls:

 Mouse position - for rotating and aiming your dash

W - for additional forward movement. 

 S - to slow down. (you don't really need it).

R - to restart

For the play in browser mode, its quite garbled. I only kept it up because the core game still  works and for the non Mac users who would still like to play of course! Lighting, tempo, animations, and artwork are all out of wack.  I couldn't for the life of me figure out what settings I needed to adjust to fit the WebGL format. If anyone has any insight on the issue I'd love some feedback. Side note the Quit button wasn't working for the browser version either, it just kinda freezes the game. So you'll have to close the tab when your done. Enjoy!
